Dear Mahmoud,

 

Wish you are doing well.

 

Kindly share below mentioned renewal documents for Chalhoub Group,

 

Unit No.

Outlet Name

G75B

The Shoe Deal Outlet

G79/G81/G81A/G85/G88

The Deal Outlet

G114

Guess Outlet

F108

The Deal Kids Outlet

SG03

Ralph Lauren Outlet

 

1.	Insurances: for All Units

*	Property All Risks/Fire & Allied Perils/Business Interruption - include “Waiver of Subrogation against the Landlord”  clause.

 

*	Third-Party Liability policy reflecting the following:Insured amount of not less than AED 10 Million.

*	Dubai Outlet Mall to be added as additional/joint insured.
*	Policy shall be extended to cover Cross Liabilities.

 

*	Workmen’s compensation including Employers Liability Insurance – Insured amount of not less than AED 2 Million.

 All insurance policies must contain full description of the insured premises/location.(Please note as per DOM standard we only accept certificate of Insurances)

 

2.	Valid Trade License for The Deal Kids Outlet_F108
3.	Here I am sharing with you Tenant contact Information form for our record. Expecting from your side to fill and send back to us.(Note: please share separate form for all units)

Unit No.

The Shoe Deal Outlet

G79/G81/G81A/G85/G88

The Deal Outlet

G114

Guess Outlet

F108

The Deal Kids Outlet

SG03

Ralph Lauren Outlet

 

1.	Insurances: for All Units

*       Property All Risks/Fire & Allied Perils/Business Interruption - include “Waiver of Subrogation against the Landlord”  clause.

 

*       Third-Party Liability policy reflecting the following:Insured amount of not less than AED 10 Million.

*  Dubai Outlet Mall to be added as additional/joint insured.

*  Policy shall be extended to cover Cross Liabilities.

 

*       Workmen’s compensation including Employers Liability Insurance – Insured amount of not less than AED 2 Million.

 All insurance policies must contain full description of the insured premises/location.(Please note as per DOM standard we only accept certificate of Insurances)

 

2.	Valid Trade License for The Deal Kids Outlet_F108
3.	Here I am sharing with you Tenant contact Information form for our record.

Dear Mahmoud,

 

Wish you are doing well.

 

Kindly share below mentioned renewal documents for Chalhoub Group,

 

Unit No.

Outlet Name

G75B

The Shoe Deal Outlet

1.	Insurances: for All Units

*       Property All Risks/Fire & Allied Perils/Business Interruption - include “Waiver of Subrogation against the Landlord”  clause.

 

*       Third-Party Liability policy reflecting the following:Insured amount of not less than AED 10 Million.

*  Dubai Outlet Mall to be added as additional/joint insured.

*  Policy shall be extended to cover Cross Liabilities.

 

*       Workmen’s compensation including Employers Liability Insurance – Insured amount of not less than AED 2 Million.

 All insurance policies must contain full description of the insured premises/location.(Please note as per DOM standard we only accept certificate of Insurances)

 

2.	Valid Trade License for The Deal Kids Outlet_F108

Dear Mahmoud,

 

Wish you are doing well.

 

Kindly share below mentioned renewal documents for Chalhoub Group,

 

Unit No.

Outlet Name

The Shoe Deal Outlet

G79/G81/G81A/G85/G88

The Deal Outlet

G114

Guess Outlet

The Deal Kids Outlet

1.	Insurances: for All Units

*       Property All Risks/Fire & Allied Perils/Business Interruption - include “Waiver of Subrogation against the Landlord”  clause.

 

*       Third-Party Liability policy reflecting the following:Insured amount of not less than AED 10 Million.

*  Dubai Outlet Mall to be added as additional/joint insured.

*  Policy shall be extended to cover Cross Liabilities.

 

*       Workmen’s compensation including Employers Liability Insurance – Insured amount of not less than AED 2 Million.

 All insurance policies must contain full description of the insured premises/location.(Please note as per DOM standard we only accept certificate of Insurances)

 

2.	Valid Trade License for The Deal Kids Outlet_F108
3.	Here I am sharing with you Tenant contact Information form for our record.

1.	Insurances: for All Units

*       Property All Risks/Fire & Allied Perils/Business Interruption - include “Waiver of Subrogation against the Landlord”  clause.

 

*       Third-Party Liability policy reflecting the following:Insured amount of not less than AED 10 Million.

*  Dubai Outlet Mall to be added as additional/joint insured.

*  Policy shall be extended to cover Cross Liabilities.

 

*       Workmen’s compensation including Employers Liability Insurance – Insured amount of not less than AED 2 Million.

 All insurance policies must contain full description of the insured premises/location.(Please note as per DOM standard we only accept certificate of Insurances)

 

2.	Valid Trade License for The Deal Kids Outlet_F108
3.	Here I am sharing with you Tenant contact Information form for our record.

Wish you are doing well.

The Deal Outlet

1.	Insurances: for All Units

*       Property All Risks/Fire & Allied Perils/Business Interruption - include “Waiver of Subrogation against the Landlord”  clause.

 

*       Third-Party Liability policy reflecting the following:Insured amount of not less than AED 10 Million.

*  Dubai Outlet Mall to be added as additional/joint insured.

*  Policy shall be extended to cover Cross Liabilities.

 

*       Workmen’s compensation including Employers Liability Insurance – Insured amount of not less than AED 2 Million.

 All insurance policies must contain full description of the insured premises/location.(Please note as per DOM standard we only accept certificate of Insurances)

 

2.	Valid Trade License for The Deal Kids Outlet_F108
3.	Here I am sharing with you Tenant contact Information form for our record.
